info.description: Empower your healthcare services with intelligent diagnostic insights of Infermedica API.

get.description: Returns a list of all available conditions.

Explains which evidence impact probability of selected condition.

evaluated_at.description: time when diagnosis was evaluated in ISO 8601 format

updated_at.description: time of last model update in ISO 8601 format

concept_types.description: list of concept types that should be captured

context.description: ordered list of ids of present symptoms that were already captured and can be used as context

correct_spelling.description: correct spelling of input text before proper analysis

mentions.description: list of recognized symptom or risk factor mentions

obvious.description: indicates that entire input text has been parsed successfully and unambiguously
